code: import{createMuiTheme}from"@material-ui/core/styles";import variants from"./variants";import typography from"./typography";import overrides from"./overrides";import breakpoints from"./breakpoints";import props from"./props";import shadows from"./shadows";var theme=function theme(variant){return createMuiTheme({spacing:4,breakpoints:breakpoints,overrides:overrides,props:props,typography:typography,shadows:shadows,body:variant.body,header:variant.header,palette:variant.palette,sidebar:variant.sidebar},variant.name);};var themes=variants.map(function(variant){return theme(variant);});export default themes;
